scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn db:up" "cd backend && yarn start:dev" "cd frontend && yarn dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && yarn build && cd ../frontend && yarn build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && yarn start:prod" "cd frontend && yarn start"
scripts.test: cd backend && yarn test && cd ../frontend && yarn test
scripts.test:coverage: cd backend && yarn test:coverage && cd ../frontend && yarn test:coverage
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock backend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/.next frontend/node_modules && yarn cache clean
scripts.lint: cd backend && yarn lint && cd ../frontend && yarn lint
scripts.type-check: cd backend && yarn type-check && cd ../frontend && yarn type-check
